casebody.data:
Karen GRAVANO, Appellant,
v.
TAKE-TWO INTERACTIVE SOFTWARE, INC., et al., Respondents. Lindsay Lohan, Appellant,
v.
Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc., et al., Respondents. 2018-46 Court of Appeals of New York. January 11, 2018

Motion by Eric M. Freedman, et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeals herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
